result.execSummary:
The defendant George A Rettammel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While under the Influence (4th Offense)], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Ct 1 Possess THC 2nd+, Ct 2 OWI 4th

Held with 15CF398 and 15TR4318. Defendant George A Rettammel in court with attorney Misty M. Muter.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amended complaint filed in 15CF1.  OWI 4th. Reading waived.   Rights/elements.   Defendant pled no contest, court adjudged guilty, JOC entered.  In 15CF1, Ct 2:  OWI 4th-court imposed 4 months jail with huber commencing 6-7-16 @ 7pm., Fine $1694.00 due 60 days or payplan.  36 month revocation/36 month interlock/AODA and comply.  In Ct 1, no contest plea, court withheld sentence and imposed 2 years probation.  Costs $518.00 -includes $250.00 DNA surcharge.  Submit DNA sample.  Dismiss  15CF398 and 15TR4318.  Jail credit 4 days for Ct 1.
